General information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.

References.[1]: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ba-133(200.Reference of the published comparison re: Ratel G.,  Michotte C., BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ba-133 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{133}$Ba and links for the 1984 international comparison CCRI(II)-K2.Ba-133, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/40/1A/06011}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2003, \textbf{40}, Tech. Suppl., 06011}

Ratel G.,  Michotte C., Sahagia M., Yunoki A., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ba-133 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{133}$Ba to include the results of the IFIN-HH (Romania) and the NMIJ (Japan), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/45/1A/06002}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2008, \textbf{45}, Tech. Suppl., 06002}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ba-133(201.Reference of the published comparison re: Michotte C., Ratel G., Courte S., Caffari Y., Fr\'{e}chou C., Thiam C., Brettner-Messler R., Maringer F.J., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ba-133 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{133}$Ba to include the 2009 result of the IRA (Switzerland) and the 2012 results of the LNE-LNHB (France) and BEV (Austria), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/51/1A/06017}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2014, \textbf{51}, Tech. Suppl., 06017}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ba-133(202.Reference of the published comparison re: Michotte C., Courte S., Coulon R., Nonis M., Judge S., Laureano-Perez L., Fytzgerald R., van Rooy M.W., van Staden M.J., Lubbe J., Galea R., Moore K., Yeltepe E. and Dirican A., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ba-133 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{133}$Ba to include the 2016 result of the NRC (Canada), the 2018 result of the TENMAK-N\"UKEN (T\"urkiye), the 2019 result of the NMISA (South Africa) and the 2019 result of the NIST (United States), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/59/1A/06020}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2022, \textbf{59}, Tech. Suppl., 06020}

Linked comparison CCRI(II)-K2.Ba-133(198.Reference of the linked comparison: Ratel G., Activity concentration of a solution of $^{133}$Ba: Results of an international comparison, \href{https://doi.org/10.1016/0168-9002(92)90916-R}{\textit{Nuclear Instruments and Methods in Physics Research Section A}, 1992, \textbf{316}:2-3, 318-323}

Linked comparison APMP.RI(II)-K2.Ba-133(.Reference of the linked comparison: Yunoki A., Mo L., Shaha V.V., Nazaroh, van Wyngaardt W.M., Yuan M.C., Nhan D.D., Park T.S., Yuandi Y., Soodprasert T., Michotte C., APMP comparison of the activity measurements of Ba-133 (APMP.RI(II)-K2.Ba-133) and links to the SIR, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/46/1A/06014}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2009, \textbf{46}, Tech. Suppl., 06014}
